long_description: A smart design allows the GCI Xpress Lounger(TM) Chair to fold flat for easy transportation to and from the campground, kids' soccer game or backyard barbecue. Chair folds down flat and quickly expands into a full-size camp chair for your lounging comfort; when folded, the built-in webbing handle lets you easily tote the chair around. Powder-coated steel construction is strong and sturdy, with a maximum capacity of 250 lbs. Pockets on each arm hold your cell phone, a cold beverage and other small essentials. The GCI Outdoor Xpress Lounger Chair has nylon-coated feet that won't scratch surfaces.
short_description: A smart design allows the GCI Xpress Lounger(TM) Chair to fold flat for easy transportation to and from the campground, kids' soccer game or backyard barbecue.
